title: Reminders Don't Appear To Save
content:
When typing reminders, hitting the check mark to save them doesn't appear to do anything. It seems the reminders are saving, but visually they are broken, and have been for MONTHS. Fix this, Google!

(see video for example: https://photos.app.goo.gl/BDPUsa7WaikUvtnd6 )
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
